reviews.review_text: Lack luster service . Waited for over 10 minutes with no one coming to take the order. This is despite us trying to get the attention of the waiter. When we were walking out the manager saw us and didn't bother to apologise or even talk to us. Definitely not Goan service. Walked over to silver spoon next door and got our food finally.

Got to know of Jerome Mendes, the owner, for a number of activities other than running this restaurant. He has been concerned about Goa issues, and some time back also restored some old Goan films (and had them shown in the local theaters). He strikes me as someone concerned about the place.
Nice restaurant. Well behaved staffs and good food. I had some snacks there once, when I was riding from Madgaon to Arambol.
